DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates the efficacy of therapy with the anti-androgen spironolactone compared to topical minoxidil in female pattern hair loss.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Therapy With the Spironolactone Pills Compared to Minoxidil Lotion in Female Pattern Hair Loss
DOC.criteria: Subjects must be premenopausal women older than 18 with female pattern hair loss. Androgen excess Other scalp or hair disorders Contraindications to spironolactone treatment, especially pregnancy, electrolyte imbalances, history of breast cancer, or intake of interfering drugs Contraindications to minoxidil treatment, especially patients who are allergic to this treatment or have a history of low blood pressure or irregular heart beats
